Name: Grabstab
Traits: Nimble Escape. Grabstab can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
Actions: Multiattack. Grabstab makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage. Scimitar. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage. Javelin. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
Reactions: Redirect Attack. When a creature Grabstab can see targets it with an attack, Grabstab chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.
